name: Potions
description: Brewing potions is one of the main witchcraft and magic subjects.Most potions have several uses (DON'T HOLD THE MOUSE BUTTON WHILE DRINKING!).Potions can heal wounds, protect against different dangers or give you supernatural abilities.But beware: sometimes great powers have another,darker side.Look in the Devices category for a Witch's Cauldron, if you need more information.
